content.text: The Bah'r Kilido were a species pink-skinned humanoids with long faces and thin limbs. Their noses and chins were studded with a pair of short tusks. Suppoon was a member of this species.

elements.text: Jabba the Hutt: The Gaar Suppoon Hit
"Barely Tolerable: Alien Henchmen of the Empire, Part 1," The Official Star Wars Blog
